skill.name: prompt-optimize
skill.description: Expert prompt engineering skill that transforms Claude into "Alpha-Prompt" - a master prompt engineer who collaboratively crafts high-quality prompts through flexible dialogue. Activates when user asks to "optimize prompt", "improve system instruction", "enhance AI instruction", or mentions prompt engineering tasks.
skill.summary: Expert prompt engineering skill that transforms Claude into "Alpha-Prompt" - a master prompt enginee...
skill.author: YYH211

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill with no executable code. Contains only YAML frontmatter and markdown documentation defining Claude's behavior as a prompt engineering consultant. No scripts, network calls, filesystem access, or command execution capabilities.

content.value_statement: Users often struggle to write effective prompts that get the best results from AI. This skill transforms Claude into a prompt engineering expert who collaborates through dialogue to craft high-quality prompts tailored to specific use cases.
actual_capabilities: Transforms Claude into a prompt engineering consultant called Alpha-Prompt
Collaborates through dialogue to understand user needs
Suggests advanced techniques like Chain-of-Thought and Tree-of-Thought
Provides security recommendations for public-facing AI roles
Delivers optimized prompts with design rationale explanation
limitations: Does not execute or test prompts automatically
Does not access external prompt libraries or databases
Does not integrate with third-party prompt management tools
Only works when user explicitly requests prompt optimization

use_cases.title: Create Production Prompts
use_cases.description: Design robust prompts for AI applications, agents, and automation workflows with security best practices built in.

use_cases.title: Generate Consistent Output
use_cases.description: Craft prompts that produce reliable, high-quality content for articles, marketing copy, and creative writing.

use_cases.title: Automate Workflows
use_cases.description: Develop prompts for task automation, data analysis, and report generation tailored to specific business needs.

prompt_templates.title: Simple Optimization
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me optimize this prompt: [INSERT YOUR PROMPT]. What improvements would make it more effective?

prompt_templates.title: Add Structure
prompt_templates.prompt: I need a prompt that makes AI output structured data. Help me design it with XML tags and clear field definitions.

prompt_templates.title: Advanced Architecture
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a multi-step prompt architecture for complex analysis. Include Chain-of-Thought reasoning and self-consistency checks.

prompt_templates.title: Secure Public Role
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a prompt for a public chatbot that resists prompt injection attacks and maintains role boundaries safely.

output_examples.input: Help me optimize this prompt: You are a helpful assistant that summarizes documents.
output: Your current prompt is very generic. Let me help you elevate it.
I recommend adding: specific role definition, output structure, example demonstrations, and clear constraints.
What type of documents will this handle, and what format do you need the summaries in?

best_practices: Provide context about your use case so the expert can suggest appropriate techniques.
Iterate through the dialogue rather than expecting a complete solution immediately.
Ask for design rationale to understand why certain techniques improve results.
anti_patterns: Using the skill for tasks unrelated to prompt engineering wastes the specialized expertise.
Not providing examples makes it harder to tailor prompts to your specific needs.
Skipping the security review for public-facing applications can lead to vulnerabilities.

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code when you request prompt optimization.

faq.question: How complex can the prompts get?
faq.answer: The skill handles everything from simple instructions to advanced architectures like CoT and ReAct.

faq.question: Can this integrate with my existing prompt library?
faq.answer: No, this skill focuses on collaborative design rather than managing external prompt repositories.

faq.question: Is my data safe when using this skill?
faq.answer: Yes, this is a prompt engineering skill with no network calls or data transmission of any kind.

faq.question: Why is my prompt not improving?
faq.answer: Provide more context about your use case, desired output format, and any constraints you need.

faq.question: How is this different from asking Claude directly?
faq.answer: This skill activates specialized expertise in prompt engineering techniques and best practices.
